subtitles.text: Good morning, this is Yuna Nakamura.
I'd like to introduce you to some fun and current trends!
I look forward to working with you!

Her hobby is fishing, and she is quite good at it!
Yuna will be introducing us to
Sweet and sour strawberry sweets!
Today, let's check out the sweets using strawberries that are in season now!
What's hot at the main store in Shinjuku Taka
It's a tart made with Benihoppe!
It uses a lot of benihoppe with just the right amount of sourness!

The berry sauce is a combination of berry sauces with a strong sourness.

Pancakes filled with strawberries in season!
The fluffy pancakes are made with fermented butter from Hokkaido, tofu and honey!
The rich pancakes are a perfect match for the tartness of the strawberries!
The pancakes are finished with a rich, sweet and sour strawberry sauce!
The crunchy coconut meringue accentuates the flavor.
When you try it, you'll see
The pancakes are fluffy and moist.
The moderately sweet whipped cream and rich custard go well with the sweet and sour strawberries.
Kihachi Cafe is currently holding a Spring Strawberry Fair!
Spring Strawberry Fair is now being held at Kihachi Cafe!
The popular Napoleon Pie and other limited-time-only menu items are now available, using strawberries in abundance!

and strawberry crunch on top.

It's a taste that can only be enjoyed during this season!
